page.title: 09Sydenhams and Piedmont(cont)
page.content:
from Camp Riding Stables trots by,or the hunt rides past the house (and through the garden!),as the area is full of foxes as well as badgers, squirrels,deer,rabbits and game birds.
I prefer the place in summer,when the land is lush and green but in the long,cold winters,we can be cut off by the snow for days,and I begin to wonder if I will ever see another person again. {Cathleen Brennan
In Piedmont it is quiet and shaded by all the trees.It has a very special countryside smell and lots of birds sing. {Rebecca Cook
